meanings.sent1: My da is very kind and loves to tell stories.

meanings.sent3: My da always pretends to be a superhero when he fixes things around the house.
meanings.sent4: To me, my da is like a sturdy oak tree, providing shade and support.
meanings.sent5: Every night, my da reads me a bedtime story with different voices for each character.

meanings.sent2: I need to buy da new book that just came out.
meanings.sent3: Da sun was shining brightly in the sky all day.
meanings.sent4: The moon looked like a giant silver coin in da night sky.
meanings.sent5: Da cat chased da mouse around the house all afternoon.
